instance-variables.name: Sorcerer's Cap
instance-variables.description: Its size covers your eyes, making you appear menacing. +200 Damage

instance-variables.name: Book of Enlightenment
instance-variables.description: Book with an LED light inside. +50 Damage

instance-variables.name: Holy Chalice
instance-variables.description: The chalice was once used to hold some yellow liquid. +100 Damage

instance-variables.name: Hourglass of Fate
instance-variables.description: Contains the sands of Boracay Beach. +150 Damage

instance-variables.name: Catalyst of Magic
instance-variables.description: A gallstone from a former Sage. +250 Damage
